TopicTitle: Alcor IVA docking with RasterProp.. what a pleasure!

Articles.Content:
The whole approach from 7.5km.. all in IVA - took a while but well worth it ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Getting close..

![ANletFi.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ANletFi.jpg)

Positioning on the selected docking port..

![sPbNcjb.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/sPbNcjb.jpg)

Final alignment.. and straight in..

![fGifwLM.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/fGifwLM.jpg)

Check and shutdown non-essential systems......![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

![f0DrKhy.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/f0DrKhy.jpg)
